knimeNode.name: Align to Inertial Principal Axes
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to align molecules to their inertial principal axes

intro.p: The node moves the centre of mass to the origin and rotates the molecule to align the co-ordinate axes with the inertial principal axes (or inertial reference frame). The first principal axis will be aligned to the x-axis.

This node was developed by Vernalis Research . For feedback and more information, please contact
knime@vernalis.com

option.name: Select the SDF or MOL column containing the conformers

fullDescription.option: Remove the input molecule column from the output table

ports.inPort: SDF or Mol table of molecules for processing
ports.outPort: Table with molecules aligned to their Inertial Principal Axes
